targets.query: SELECT abs((last("uptime") - (last("uptime")-43200))) FROM /^$TBL_STATS$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT abs(mean("count_full_ping_drop") - (mean("count_full_obstructed_ping_drop") + mean("count_full_unscheduled_ping_drop"))) AS "Obstructed + No Satellites + Beta Downtime" FROM "spacex.starlink.user_terminal.ping_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Max Speeds Seen (In given time range)

targets.query: SELECT "state" AS "State", "currently_obstructed" AS "Obstructed", "alert_unexpected_location" AS "Bad Location", "alert_thermal_throttle" AS "Temp Throttled", "alert_thermal_shutdown" AS "Temp Shutdown", "alert_motors_stuck" AS "Motors Stuck", "alert_mast_not_near_vertical" AS "Mast not Vertical", "alert_slow_ethernet_speeds" AS "Slow Ethernet", "software_version" AS "Software Version", "hardware_version" AS "Hardware Version" FROM /^$TBL_STATS$/ WHERE $timeFilter
